description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sweepy is a fun and addictive game. It's a mix between swap and speed. Destroy as soon as possible all the tiles forming lines. Longer are the lines, more you will get powers to explode the tiles. This game is playable alone in time limit mode or in survival mode. In versus mode, you can play with your friend in a frantic points race. Attack to slow down him. Be the best!
description.short: Sweepy is a fun and addictive game. It's a mix between swap and speed. Destroy as soon as possible all the tiles forming lines. Longer are the lines, more you will get powers to explode the tiles. This game is playable alone in time limit mode or in survival mode. In versus mode, you can play with your friend in a frantic points race. Attack to slow down him. Be the best!
